q: why does the man in the video remove the snow
pred: The man in the video is removing snow from his car to make it easier to drive and to prevent any potential damage to the car's paint or other parts. Snow can accumulate on the car's windows, mirrors, and other surfaces, which can obstruct the driver's view and make it difficult to see the road. By removing the snow, the man is ensuring that his car is safe and functional, allowing him to drive without any issues.
